articles.title: Shonda Rhimes Teases ‘Bridgerton’ Season 3 Ending | Bridgerton, Luke Newton, Netflix, nicola coughlan, Shonda Rhimes, Television - Just Jared
articles.content:
Shonda Rhimes is teasing what is to come from the final four episodes of Bridgerton season three.
The first half of the season debuted last month and ended with a cliffhanger of Colin (Luke Newton) … [+744 chars]
